pr_title: Show progress indication when deleting media files (issue #7036)

timeline.message: Add a progress dialog when deleting media files

timeline.bodyText:
Can you use a <plurals here with one and other defined so the word "files" can better be translated into languages (for example: Lithuanian plurals depends on the suffix of the number - 11 and 12 may use a different word for files)
You'll need to refer to it via
int deletedFiles = result.getInt();
deckPicker.getResources().getQuantityString(R.plurals.XXX, deletedFiles, deletedFiles)
Optional: %d files deleted reads better to me.
timeline.author: david-allison-1
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -136,7 +136,10 @@
     <string name="check_media_no_unused_missing">No unused or missing files found</string>
     <string name="check_media_db_updated">Media database rebuilt</string>
     <string name="check_media_delete_unused">Delete unused</string>
-    <string name="check_media_deleted">Files deleted: %d</string>
+
+    <string name="delete_media_message">Deleting media…</string>
+    <string name="delete_media_result_title">Deletion result</string>
+    <string name="delete_media_result_message">Files deleted: %d</string>
